tool_description: This AI generated content checker API tries to detect whether provided text is generated by some AI bot or it is human-written.
name: AI Generated Content Detector
title: AI Generated Content Detector

api_list.name: text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: I don't possess personal experiences, emotions, or consciousness. Instead, I generate responses based on patterns and information present in the data I was trained on. My purpose is to assist users like you to the best of my abilities and provide helpful information and responses to your inquiries. If you have any questions or need assistance with a topic, feel free to ask, and I'll do my best to provide you with the information you're looking for.
